item.title: Dude Theft Wars Cheat Codes (September 2024)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Dude Theft Wars Cheat Codes
  • How to Use Cheat Codes in Dude Theft Wars

Dude Theft Wars is an action-adventure game, or rather, a sandbox simulation of a world where you can do anything. This game looks like a low-budget GTA , but that doesn't make it bad, because it has plenty of interesting features and lets you have fun. You can play alone or multiplayer with friends and other players. While the game is fun, you might get bored at some point, but you shouldn't be quick to quit because there are quite a few Dude Theft Wars cheat codes that you can use to diversify the gameplay.

Updated September 16, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: Whether you're a new player or a seasoned fan, this guide will help you get the most out of your gameplay. Check back later to redeem more cheat codes.

All Dude Theft Wars Cheat Codes

Active Dude Theft Wars Codes

  • Spawnbox - Enter this code to spawn Box.
  • Spawntoy - Enter this code to spawn Yellow Toy Car.
  • Spawngift - Enter this code to spawn Gift.
  • Spawnbats - Enter this code to spawn Bats.
  • Spookyghosts - Enter this code to spawn Ghost.
  • Spookyskeleton - Enter this code to spawn Skeleton.
  • Heypopo - Enter this code to spawn Angry Cop.
  • Spawnmilk - Enter this code to spawn Milk.
  • Spawnfootball - Enter this code to spawn Football.
  • Gaarhi50 - Enter this code to to damage yourself. (You can change the value from 1 to 60)
  • AlienInVasion - Enter this code to summon an Alien.
  • AntDude - Enter this code for Jack gets lowercase.
  • Bankrob - Enter this code to spawn a bag of money.
  • ChadAxe - Enter this code to spawn Chad’s Axe.
  • ChibiTown - Enter this code to make all NPCs have a big head.
  • Crowd 99 - Enter this code to increase the crowd size.
  • Day - Enter this code to transform the time into morning.
  • Dudebolt - Enter this code to make yourself faster.
  • Dudekong - Enter this code to explode nearby cars.
  • Evening - Enter this code to transform the time into evening.
  • Giantdudes - Enter this code to make yourself giant.
  • Heytaxi - Enter this code to call cars toward the player.
  • LockRichie - Enter this code to lock Richie.
  • MakeMeRich - Enter this code to spawn fake money.
  • Moongravity - Enter this code to activate Moon gravity.
  • Night - Enter this code to transform the time into night.
  • Nosforever - Enter this code to increase the speed of a car.
  • Party - Enter this code to spawn a column of fireworks.
  • PopoPlz - Enter this code to get a five-star wanted level.
  • Crowd (0-100) - Enter this code to spawn People (0-100) -1,000,000,000,000,000,000.
  • SpawnBanana - Enter this code to spawn a Banana.
  • SpawnEgg - Enter this code to spawn EggMilk.
  • SpawnADude - Enter this code to spawn a Dude.
  • Sperhero - Enter this code to turn Jack into Superman.
  • Spyman - Enter this code to turn Jack into Spider-Man.
  • SpawnLamboCar - Enter this code to spawn a Lamborghini car.
  • Rockets - Enter this code to spawn fireworks.
  • TinyDudes - Enter this code to make all NPCs lowercase.
  • NosForever - Enter this code to give all cars with nitrous infinite nitro.
  • Moongravity - Enter this code to give the player a big jump.
  • Suppahotslap - Enter this code to give the player a strong slap.
  • MakeHouse - Enter this code to create a house.
  • MakeBuilding - Enter this code to construct a building.
  • MakeRamp - Enter this code to create a ramp.
  • MakeRoad - Enter this code to create a road.
  • MakeParkHouse - Enter this code to make an alcove.
  • MakeFence - Enter this code to create a fence.
  • MakeWaterTank - Enter this code to create a water tank.
  • MakeWindTurbine - Enter this code to create a wind turbine.
  • MakeTree - Enter this code to create a tree.
  • MakePineLong - Enter this code to create a tall pine tree.
  • MakeBirch - Enter this code to create a birch tree.
  • MakePine - Enter this code to create a pine tree.
  • MakePinkTree - Enter this code to create a pink tree.
  • MakeOrangeTree - Enter this code to create an orange tree.
  • MakeGrass - Enter this code to create grass.
  • MakeFlowers - Enter this code to create flowers.
  • MakeBush - Enter this code to create a bush.
  • MakeLamp - Enter this code to create a lamp.
  • MakeSpaceTower - Enter this code to create a tower from the center.

Expired Dude Theft Wars Codes

  • SpawnMoneyBag
  • SpawnFakeCash
  • SpawnUFO
  • cashcash (1-9999999)
  • SuperMan
  • Carboom
  • MakeClocktower

How to Use Cheat Codes in Dude Theft Wars

Using Dude Theft Wars cheats is simple and will take you a few clicks. There are no limits on the use of cheat codes in the game, and you can even spam them to create many items in seconds. If you haven't used Dude Theft Wars cheats before or don't know how to do it, here's a detailed guide:

  • After spawning in the world, look on the left side of the screen, there should be a phone icon. Click on it.
  • Once you do this, you will open the phone interface, where there will be various apps.
  • Among them, find and interact with the one called ChEaTs.Exe and the hooded hacker icon.
  • After doing that, you will open a new tab with an input field and a green check mark.
  • Now, enter one of the above cheat codes into the input field and click on the green checkmark to perform the command.
  • If you enter the cheat code correctly, you will see a notification in the upper-right corner of the screen, that says the command has been performed.

In this way, you can also spam by clicking on the checkmark button to spawn, for example, many items or NPCs.

Dude Theft Wars is available on mobile.

item.title: Star Stable Codes (September 2024)
item.description:
Star Stable is a game perfect for players of all ages who are horse lovers. The game has many different activities pertaining to horses, as well as customization elements, and much more. Some items are difficult to obtain, but by redeeming Star Stable codes, you will receive many rewards for free.

Updated September 16, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: We have done all the work for you by collecting all active codes in one convenient place. All you have to do is redeem them.

Star Stable: All Codes

Below are all active Star Stable codes.

Codes Checked on September 16, 2024.

Active Codes

  • SLAYETH - Enter this code to get Cosmetic Items.
  • MEDIEVALMADNESS - Enter this code to get Cosmetic Items.
  • CLOSERTOTHEHORSE - Enter this code to get 15 Star Coins.
  • FLASHDANCE - Enter this code to get 5 days of free Star Rider.
  • HIPPESTQUICKEST - Enter this code to get 15 Star Coins.
  • SSOCON23ALL - Enter this code to get SSO Convention 2023 T-shirt.
  • RAINBOWUNITY - Enter this code to get Rainbow Head Ribbon.
  • BLIZZARD - Enter this code to get Celebrity Ski Trip Bridle and Saddle.
  • TEAMCARROTS - Enter this code to get Purple Carrots for Saddlebag Pet.
  • FORTPINTA - Enter this code to get Fort Pinta Leg Wraps.
  • 1WEEKSR2023 - Enter this code to get 7 days of Star Rider membership.
  • RIDEWITHUS - Enter this code to get Sweater.
  • SILVERJACKET - Enter this code to get Silver Jacket Cosmetic.
  • BRONZEJACKET - Enter this code to get Bronze Jacket Cosmetic.
  • THUMBSUP - Enter this code to get T-shirt.
  • READTHEBOOK - Enter this code to get Starshine Plush Saddlebag Pet.
  • HORSESNACK - Enter this code to get Apple and Carrot treat.
  • STARSHINEPLUSH - Enter this code to get Starshine Plush Saddlebag Pet.

Expired Codes

  • PONY
  • MOORLAND
  • GREY
  • FREEPLAYER11
  • HAPPYHORSE
  • BROWN
  • AREWETHEREYETI22
  • BACKUPBLANKET
  • SKIDELUXE
  • ALLIN2022
  • FEBRUARY22
  • DEERMASK4U
  • SANTAHAT4U
  • HOLIDAYFUN
  • WINTERRIDER
  • HALLOW2021
  • FRIENDSHIPDAY
  • BEARHUG
  • FEELINSPLENDID
  • SADDLEUP10
  • HAPPYNEWYEAR2024
  • DISLIKECARROTS10
  • READYTOPARTY10
  • STARSTABLEVEST
  • INSPIRATION2018
  • 1WEEKFREE
  • STARSTABLEHONEY
  • 7DAYSFREE
  • INSTA500K
  • FORESTER
  • MYSTIC
  • WARRIOR
  • WARMWISH2020
  • WELOVEHORSES
  • BIRTHDAYFUN
  • OPENHOUSERED
  • OPENHOUSEBLUE
  • EXPLORESILVERGLADE
  • RACEWITHME
  • EXPLOREJORVIK
  • READYSETDRAW
  • TRAILRIDE

Star Stable: How to Redeem Codes

Usually, you can redeem codes directly in the game, but to do this in Star Stable , you must visit their website. Below are the instructions to help you redeem the codes.

  • Go to starstable.com.
  • Log in to your account and then confirm it. You will receive a confirmation email.
  • After that, click the Account button and select the Redeem a code option.
  • Paste the code from our list into the empty field and click Redeem. You will find the rewards in your in-game mailbox.

Star Stable is available on PC and mobile.

item.title: Roblox: IT GIRL Codes (September 2024)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All IT GIRL Codes
  • How to Redeem IT GIRL Codes
  • How to Get More IT GIRL Codes

IT GIRL is a Roblox fashion game in which you'll be placed into the stylish shoes of a model. Customize your character, purchase clothes, and match them with makeup and accessories to create an unforgettable look and win at the fashion shows. The higher you rank among other models, the more diamonds you earn, which can then be spent on further character customization. If you want to get in on the action right away, we recommend that you use IT GIRL codes, which will give you diamonds and other useful things to help you make a unique and beautiful model.

Updated September 16, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: This article has been updated so that you have access to the newest codes. We do our best, so you can bookmark this page and come back later to get cool freebies.

All IT GIRL Codes

Working IT GIRL Codes

  • PH4NT0MM4X – Redeem this code for a Mask.
  • RUPAULSD0LL – Redeem this code for Silver Crown.
  • TAVERSIA – Redeem this code for Roses headband.
  • MADDYAFK – Redeem this code for 200 Diamonds.
  • ITGIRL – Redeem this code for 250 Diamonds.

Expired IT GIRL Codes

  • H4PPY10KL1K3S1TG1RL – Redeem this code for Butterfly accessory.
  • BRAT – Redeem this code for Brat T-Shirt.
  • M1SST3KK – Redeem this code for Miss Tekk’s Dress.

How to Redeem IT GIRL Codes

If you have already redeemed codes in other Roblox games, you shouldn't have any problems with this one. However, if you are a beginner or don't know how to redeem codes in this particular game, follow our step-by-step instructions below.

  • Launch IT GIRL .
  • Find and click the button with the gear icon on the left side of the screen.
  • After that, you will see the settings panel with a field for entering codes in the center.
  • Type or paste one of the working IT GIRL codes from the list above into the field and click the Redeem button.

How to Get More IT GIRL Codes

Although you can always check her for new Roblox codes, you can also find them manually by visiting the game's official social media channels. Here, along with other content, developers often share codes, so keep an eye out to be the first to receive rewards:

  • Official IT GIRL X account
  • Official IT GIRL Discord
  • Official IT GIRL Roblox group

item.title: Roblox: Hide & Sneak Transform Codes (September 2024)
item.description:
Hide & Sneak Transform is an interesting game in which gamers are divided into 2 teams. During the match, players from both teams can use various advantages, such as transforming into another object in the case of those who are hiding. Unfortunately, this costs currency, which is quite difficult to obtain. To help fans cope with the task, this guide lists all the Hide & Sneak Transform codes. With these codes, users can get not only currency but also a lot of other cool stuff, such as skins or likes boxes.

Updated September 16, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: We have carefully updated this article so that you can redeem the latest codes. With that in mind, come back later.

All Hide & Sneak Transform Codes

By redeeming codes, gamers can get a lot of cool stuff to gain an advantage in matches or simply change their character's appearance. Fortunately, the developers give really generous rewards for the code redemption, and they also release them often. So, without wasting any time, here are the codes that are currently available.

Codes Checked on September 16, 2024.

Working Hide & Sneak Transform Codes

  • coolskin - Redeem this code to get 1 Skin.
  • veryhappy - Redeem this code to get 500 Coins.
  • betterfuture - Redeem this code to get 500 Coins.
  • supergame - Redeem this code to get 1,000 Coins.
  • happygame - Redeem this code to get 200 Coins.
  • comesoon - Redeem this code to get 1 Likes Box.
  • goodluck - Redeem this code to get 1 Likes Box.
  • mysterygift - Redeem this code to get 1 Likes Box.
  • coolandgift - Redeem this code to get 1 Likes Box.
  • keepitup - Redeem this code to get 1 Likes Box.
  • verynice - Redeem this code to get 1 Skin.

Expired Hide & Sneak Transform Codes

  • updated
  • mysterybox

How to Redeem Codes for Hide & Sneak Transform

After launching the game, players can immediately redeem codes, without any time or level restrictions. This is good because having currency from the start is useful, as it makes it easier for gamers to understand the mechanics and buy some useful items or buffs. You should do the following:

  • Launch Hide & Sneak Transform .
  • Pay attention to the right side of the screen, there are several buttons, including Menu. It's worth noting that sometimes the game interface is transparent, but don't worry because it will eventually load completely.
  • Click on the Menu button to open the drop-down list.
  • In the drop-down list, there will be several buttons, among which players should interact with the first one that says Codes.
  • Now, you can see a new screen with a corresponding interface for entering codes and an Enter button.
  • Now, simply copy one of the above codes, or enter it manually, and then press Enter to get the reward.

item.title: Purgatory Island Event Start Date and Rewards in Warzone
item.description:
Since its launch in 2020, Call of Duty: Warzone has had its fair share of in-game events where players dropping into the action can earn a wealth of rewards on offer. The Haunting returns as part of the Season 6 update alongside Purgatory Island, a fresh take on the popular Rebirth Island map.

The final season of the Urzikstan era contains plenty of events including The Walking Dead: Road to Terminus and Trick 'r Treat: Candy Hunt giving fans plenty of chances to unlock all kinds of limited-edition items. Here, find out when the Warzone Purgatory Island event takes place and the expected list of rewards on offer.

Warzone Purgatory Island Event Start Date

The Warzone Purgatory Island event begins on September 25 . The event runs until October 16 giving players three weeks to earn all of the rewards up for grabs.

The Purgatory Island event is the last one arriving to Warzone before Black Ops 6 integrates into the game as part of its first post-launch season. Purgatory Island's unique aesthetic creates an additional layer of spookiness to Rebirth Island.

What Is Purgatory Island?

Purgatory Island ties into the Purgatory limited-time mode that's also arriving as part of Warzone 's Season 6 update. Instead of players dropping onto the standard version of Rebirth Island, players will land on Hellscape featuring a fresh coat of paint; and instead of teams battling to become the last one standing, they have to earn a specific victory condition by scoring kills and commending other players in the lobby.

The Hellscape map also contains Shipment which flies as its own separate island above the map during Purgatory matches. Players can use portals, parachutes, and helicopters to gain access to the island and the items it contains.

Warzone Purgatory Island Event Rewards

The Warzone Purgatory Island event rewards haven't arrived yet but there's a strong possibility of the event following the same formula as other events taking place throughout Season 6.

The Call of Duty blog states players will have to 'complete event challenges' to earn the rewards on offer. In most cases, challenges involve scoring eliminations with a particular weapon category or a certain number of contracts. The Purgatory mode contains plenty of new mechanics for players to master so there's a chance the challenges involve using those features to complete the tasks. Here are all of the items and rewards expected to arrive :

  • Double XP tokens
  • Battle Pass tokens
  • Calling cards
  • Emblems
  • Weapon charms
  • Weapon blueprints
  • Weapon camouflages
  • Sprays
  • Emotes

The Purgatory Island event in Call of Duty: Warzone is one of the last times players can earn rewards before the focus turns to the launch of Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 and the arrival of the Area 99 map expected to replace Rebirth Island.
